DownloadPressKitsRow.title: Press kits / materials download
DownloadPressKitsRow.description: You can download ELSOUL's logo, company profile, and service materials.
DownloadPressKitsRow.meritTitle1: Here to download the press kits and materials
DownloadPressKitsRow.meritDescription1: You can download ELSOUL LABO's company profile, management profile, photos, materials about Epics, various logo data, etc. We would appreciate your letting the team know when you use it.
